snippet: MacCRATE--Robert. July 18, 1921- April 6, 2016 and Constance Trapp MacCrate November 17, 1920 - January 21, 2016. A Memorial Service will be held for Bob and Connie MacCrate on Saturday, April 30, 1pm at the Congregational Church of Manhasset, 1845 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, NY 11030. In lieu of flowers, the family is suggesting a donation to The MacCrate Fund to Preserve the Core Values of the Legal Profession, c/o The New York Bar Foundation, 1 Elk Street, Albany NY 12207. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MacCRATE--Robert. July 18, 1921- April 6, 2016 and Constance Trapp MacCrate November 17, 1920 - January 21, 2016. A Memorial Service will be held for Bob and Connie MacCrate on Saturday, April 30, 1pm at the Congregational Church of Manhasset, 1845 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, NY 11030. In lieu of flowers, the family is suggesting a donation to The MacCrate Fund to Preserve the Core Values of the Legal Profession, c/o The New York Bar Foundation, 1 Elk Street, Albany NY 12207. 1/3
